title: Multimodal Meta Data Schema (Optional and Arbitrary Types)
description: Schema for audio, text, and image data. All fields are optional and types are arbitrary.

audio.description: Audio data path or encoded data. Type is arbitrary as no 'type' keyword is specified.

text.description: Text data or transcript. Type is arbitrary as no 'type' keyword is specified.

image.description: Image data path or encoded data. Type is arbitrary as no 'type' keyword is specified.
